entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
